SA21n2918:10: tatra vaibhāṣikasthityā śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ ca vyākhyāyate |
SA21n2918:17: evaṃ mādhy- amiko'pi māyopamādva-yavādi-sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānavādi bhedāt dvi- vidhaḥ |
SA21n2918:25: tad uktam- (p1) asti khalv iti nīlādi jagad iti jaḍīyase |
SA21n2918:27: (3) asti pudgalo- “bhāravāho ṇa ṇiccaṃ bhaṇāmi ṇāṇiccam bhaṇāmī“ ti,
SA21n2918:28: pu- dgalaś ca rāgavān saṃsaratīti rāgaprahāṇāyāśudhā bhāvanā dhyānam |
SA21n2918:30: tad uktam- imaṃ carmapuṭaṃ tāvat svabuddhau ca pṛthakkuru |
SA21n2918:32: (4) asthīny api pṛthakkṛtvā paśya majjānam antataḥ |
SA21n2918:33: kim atra sāram astīti svayam eva vicāraya ||
SA21n2918:36: yāvaj jīvaṃ buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
SA21n2918:37: kiṃ punar vandyau su- gatau'tha buddhau,
SA21n2918:38: yāvat kuśalamūlaṃ tam ekam ātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmy eka atmānaṃ śamayiṣyāmy ekam ātamānaṃ parinirvāpayi- ṣyāmīti dṛṣṭiḥ |
SA21n2918:43: III. śrāvaka-adhimātrasya bāhyārthāṅgīkāriṇaḥ śarīrasya nairātmya- tāvyavasthāpanaṃ vivṛtiḥ |
SA21n2918:51: IV. atra ca mṛduśrāvako niyatagotratvād akāruṇikatvāt śākyabuddha evety eke |
SA21n2918:52: anye tu- (p2) sarve buddhā bhaviṣyanti nābhavyo bhuvi vidyate |
SA21n2918:55: niyatagotraṃ tu kiñcit buddham apekṣata iti manyate |
SA21n2918:61: tatra indriyān nirodho vipaśyanā pudgalasyānupalabdhiḥ kāyavākcetasāṃ saṃyamaḥ śamathaḥ |
SA21n2918:66: tad uktam- anāgatāyāṃ nidrāyāṃ pranaṣṭe bāhyagocare |
SA21n2918:67: yā bhaven manaso'vasthā bhāvayet tāṃ prayatnataḥ ||
SA21n2918:70: tad āhuḥ nāgārjunapādāḥ- ajānānaṃ hi prajñānaṃ nidrādṛṣṭāntasādhitam |
SA21n2918:72: (8) bhagavataḥ pravacanam api- varaṃ jetavane ramye śṛgālatvaṃ vrajāmy aham |
SA21n2918:73: na tu vaiśeṣikaṃ mokṣaṃ gotvam āgantum arhati ||
SA21n2918:78: duḥ- khaduḥkhatā-vipariṇāmaduḥkhatābhyām ahanyahani sattvān ālambya yā karuṇotpadyate sā sattvāvalambanā |
SA21n2918:79: śrāvakasya deśanā vācakī pratyekabu- ddhasya tu kāyikī |
SA21n2918:80: tad uktam- (p3) sambuddhānām anutpāde śrāvakānāṃ punaḥ kṣaye |
SA21n2918:86: tasya ceyam eva pratyavekṣaṇā yad uta sākārajñānajanakatvaṃ nāma |
SA21n2918:87: tad āhuḥ- bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ |
SA21n2918:91: tad uktam abhyāsasyeyaṃ kalanā yat kālaḥ saṃkhyā kriyāyāḥ |
SA21n2918:93: paricayaś ca- cittaṃ niścitya bodhena abhyāsaṃ kurute yadā |
SA21n2918:94: tadā cittaṃ na paśyāmi kva gataṃ sthitaṃ bhavet ||
SA21n2918:98: tritayānupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitāsva- bhāvena pañcapāramitācaraṇaṃ phalavaimukhyena sattvārthapariṇāmanā tad dṛṣṭir iti |
SA21n2918:100: tatra sākārāravijñānavādī “ṣaṭkena yugapad yo- gāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṅgate“ ty ādinā nyāyena paramāṇūnām apy anupapat- teḥ |
SA21n2918:101: cittamātram evedaṃ cittākāradhāri grāhyagrāhakabhāvavinirmuktaṃ prakāśaṃ prakāśata iti pratipannavān |
SA21n2918:102: tad uktaṃ cittamātraṃ bho jina- putrā ! yad uta traidhātukam iti |
SA21n2918:103: tathā cāhuḥ kīrtipādāḥ- dhiyo nīlādirūpatve bāhyo'rthaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ |
SA21n2918:109: (15) tasmāt cittam eva citrākāraṃ paraṃ nirapekṣaprakāśyaṃ prakāśata iti sākāravijñānavādiyogācārasya vivṛtiḥ |
SA21n2918:110: nirākāravādiyogācaras tu cittam eva idam anākārasvasamvedanarūpaṃ iti manyate |
SA21n2918:111: tad uktam- bhāhye na vidyate hy artho yathā bālair vikalpyate |
SA21n2918:113: (16) yāvad ābhāsate yac ca tan māyaiva ca bhāsate |
SA21n2918:119: tad uktam- yatra yatra mano yāti jñeye tatraiva yojayet |
SA21n2918:120: calitvā yāsyate kutra sarvam eva hi tanmayam ||
SA21n2918:123: tathā ca- rūpam asya mataṃ svacchaṃ nirākāraṃ nirañjanam |
SA21n2918:124: śakyaṃ tena na hi jñātum abuddhena kadācana ||
SA21n2918:125: (20) vijñaptimātram evadam ity api hy upalambhataḥ |
SA21n2918:127: (21) yadā tv ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ naivopalabhate tadā |
SA21n2918:132: tathā coktam- yad yad vai dṛśyate kiñcit tat tat brahmeti kalpayet |
SA21n2918:137: bodhāmbhodhau mayi svacchaṃ tac chāyam viśvabuddhayaḥ |
SA21n2918:138: udito vā pralīno vā na vikalpāya kalpate ||
SA21n2918:142: tatra māyopamādvayavādinaḥ vivṛtiḥ- na san nāsan na sadasan na cāpy anubhayātmakam |
SA21n2918:147: tathā doṣād dvandvāt ubhayam api na,
SA21n2918:149: api ca pūrvetaraparāmarśāt- mūrtiś citre yathāvastuśakti- - skavāsaṅgaḥ (?) ! (26)
SA21n2918:155: sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānavādi- nāṃ tv ayaṃ vicāraḥ- na matam śāśvataṃ viśvaṃ na cocchedisamīhitam |
SA21n2918:158: athaiṣā kalpanā naiva yac cid vetti na cittatām ||
SA21n2918:159: (28) yo vit sarvasamāropaḥ sa sarvaḥ sarvathā na hi |
SA21n2918:161: (29) anābhogaṃ hi yad jñānaṃ tac cāintyaṃ pracakṣate |
SA21n2918:162: sañcinti yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi ||
SA21n2918:163: (30) yenājātaṃ jagad buddhaṃ buddhiḥ śuddhaiva bodhataḥ |
SA21n2918:164: nijaṃ tasya jagat satyam anābhogena dhīmataḥ ||
SA21n2918:165: (31) tad uktam- sarvāropavinirmukte svatas tattve cakāsati |
SA21n2918:167: (32) asya ca vicārāya āyātasya arthasya anāroparūpasya anabhiniveśavihāreṇa sākṣātkriyā dhyānaṃ |
SA21n2918:171: dharmāvalam- banā cānityatāvyasanasampātinaḥ sarvadharmān ālambya utpadyate yā sā boddhavyā |
SA21n2918:172: abhimātrasya ca ālambananiḥsvabhāvā manaskāradharmā- dhigamānālambanā karuṇā |
SA21n2918:174: tathā ca- karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam |
SA21n2918:175: ā bhavāt so'nupacchannaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ ||
SA21n2918:178: (34) sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ |
SA21n2918:182: mantranayas tu asmābhir ihātigambhīratvād gambhīranayādhimuktika- puruṣaviṣayatvāt caturmudrādisādhanaprakāśanavistaratvāc ca na vyāk- riyate |
SA21n2918:183: tathā ca- (7) ekārthatve'py asaṃmohāt bahūpāyād aduṣkarāt |
SA21n2918:185: (36) kṛtaś cāsmābhir atra sekanirṇayo nāma granthaḥ |
SA21n2918:186: (avasānaṃ) nanu yadi mahāyānanirṇīta evārthaḥ paramārtho'sti atra kim arthaṃ tarhi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne bhagavān deśitavān,
SA21n2918:190: upāyas tv ayaṃ sambuddhaiḥ sopānam iva nirmitaḥ ||
SA21n2918:191: (37) saddharmapuṇḍarīke'py uktam- ekaṃ tu yānaṃ hi nayaś ca eka ekā ciyaṃ deśana nāyakānāṃ |
SA21n2918:192: upāyakauśalya mamaivarūpaṃ yat trīṇi yānāny upadarśayāmi ||
SA21n2918:193: (38) nāgārjunapādair apy uktam- dharmadhātor asaṃbhedād dhyānabhedo'sti na prabho |
SA21n2918:195: (39) anyatrāpy uktam- muktis tu śūnyatādṛṣṭis tadarthāśeṣabhāvaṇā |
SA21n2918:197: idaṃ ca yānatritayaprakāśanaṃ manyamānaśūnyatā saiva bhagavato 'vagantavyaḥ |
SA21n2918:198: tathāhi- nodāhṛtaṃ tvayā kiñcid ekam apy akṣaraṃ vibho |
SA21n2918:204: (43) yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvac cittaṃ pravartate |
SA21n2918:205: (8) parāvṛtte tu vai citte na yānaṃ nāpi yāyinaḥ ||
SA21n2918:210: (46) vidhāya bhavyārthanāyaprayatnād imaṃ mayā grantham anuttarā- rtham |
SA21n2918:211: ālambhi yat puṇyam anena lokas tathāgatatvaṃ labhatām alabhyam ||
